comments: The list of acronyms you have to memorize for the final can be overwhelming at first, but, she teaches them in a way that you don\'t have to memorize. I managed to get an A on the final. Group assignment was fun. However, she was hands down the best part about this course- her passion is contagious. Take her!!

Yes, this class was easy. Yes, Prof. Tessier is sweet and extremely passionate. I cannot say that this class was eye-opening--it focused on the obvious, unlike some of my friends\' SPED 301 courses. Memorize the acronyms, complete project requirements, and you\'ll be fine grade-wise. Participate and she\'ll love you.

She is SO sweet and so nice, very easy grader! you have to work a little for a grade, but overall easy A. she is very passionate and knows what she is talking about. recommend her over any other professor. final, group project, and observation. few quizzes, she tells you ahead of time. anything less than an A and you did something wrong lol.

best professor ever. she is the sweetest. she will do anything for her students. her assignments are really easy...she feels bad about making them too hard. she knows SO much about special education. for a 3 hour monday morning, 8am class, i NEVER missed one! TAKE HER!
